title: WeAreOPL Week 1, feedback thread
body:
So, we just had Week 1 of the new show, WeAreOPL. A new show that talks to the local eSports personalities.

Decided to make a thread where everyone can leave their open thoughts about it. 

What did you like?

What do you want for next time?

What could be improved?

Go

replies.body:
Thanks for making this Jason.

Looking forward to feedback, VoD will be available from twitch.tv/WeAreOPL if you missed it!

luckily you mentioned, otherwise, I will have no idea where to find this.

thanks, keep it up boys.

where was it advertised? cause i honestly had no clue about this show..

i feel this is something that could be put into the client like the AMA's


the sound was lost thru a good chunk of the stream.. thanks twitch.


but overall i really liked it, i was actually surprised at Chief Swiffer's response regarding the invitational.


i'll rate 7/10

I'll throw a few notes.

- Audio
the balance was a bit off at the start, but was adjusted later. Some slight balancing would be needed for new guests and for individual clips, but overall pretty well managed past 5 minutes.

- Visual
the transitions between scenes are very default. I'm unsure how you can adjust that, but would make things a bit more fluent.

- Guests
Your guest choice was alright, I guess..... kek

- Feel
the show felt like a strange hybrid of interview and conversation. You could change the dynamic to make it more one than the other, but the balance is a bit off.

Overall, pretty good for a first episode, I look forward to seeing this show change and evolve ( and hopefully not end up like "OCE Power plays" did )
